TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class ScriptControl : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl, System.Web.UI.IScriptControl
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ScriptControl extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl implements class System.Web.UI.IScriptControl
Public MustInherit Class ScriptControl Inherits WebControl Implements IScriptControl
public ref class ScriptControl abstract : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebControl, System::Web::UI::IScriptControl
type ScriptControl = class inherit WebControl interface IScriptControl

summary.span: 为脚本控件提供一个抽象基类。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class for a script control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从类继承 并实现 接口。 inherits from the class and implements the interface. 类是 ASP.NET Web 服务器控件的基类。The class is a base class for ASP.NET Web server controls. 是一个抽象类，不能直接对其进行实例化。The is an abstract class, which you cannot instantiate directly. 相反，将基于此抽象类派生类。Instead, you derive a class based on this abstract class. 基类在 派生控件的阶段测试控件的页面 `PreRender` 。The base class tests the page for a control during the `PreRender` stage of the derived control. 基类还可以确保派生的控件调用控件的方法 ，以便在事件期间注册脚本 `Render` 。The base class also makes sure that the derived control calls methods of the control to register script during the `Render` event. 这包括在 调用方法时为注册对象 。This includes registering objects for the when the method is called. 方法可确保 不呈现对象，除非 呈现本身。The method makes sure that objects are not rendered unless the itself is rendered. 这使得 能够在关闭的控件内工作 。This enables a to work inside a closed control. 您可以根据需要向派生自的任何类添加任意数量的描述符和类型 。You can add as many descriptors and types as necessary to any class that you derive from .

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，返回控件的脚本文件。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the script files for the control.

returns.span: 一个 集合，其中包含已注册为嵌入资源的 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 文件。

span.span: An collection that contains ECMAScript (JavaScript) files that have been registered as embedded resources.

summary.span: 引发 事件，并将脚本控件注册到 控件。

span.span: Raises the event and registers the script control with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发基类的事件后，该 方法会向控件注册脚本控件 。After the event of the base class is raised, the method registers the script control with the control.

summary.span: 引发 事件并将服务器控件内容发送至提供的 对象，此对象编写要呈现到浏览器的内容。

span.span: Raises the event and sends server control content to a provided object, which writes the content to be rendered to the browser.
